title: Corsair Air Coolers Are BACK!
description: The Corsair A500 is their brand new air cooler that's meant to take on Noctua and be quiet! but there were some other things being shown too.    Thanks to Thermaltake, Razer, be quiet! and Phanteks for sponsoring our CES 2020 coverage.  Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #corsairA500 #bestaircooler #ces2020 #hardwarecanucks
